Package app.controllers

Interface Warehouse

All Known Implementing Classes:
WarehouseClass
public interface Warehouse
Represents the controller of the API Applies project's business rules

  • Method Details

    • daoConnection

      void daoConnection()
      Establishes connection with the Database
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when connection fails

    • deleteItem

      void deleteItem​(Warehouse warehouse, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, int i)
      Deletes an Item
      Parameters:
      warehouse - A Warehouse object
      resp - #HttpServletResponse type used to send http response
      i - Id of the element to delete

    • itemIdExists

      boolean itemIdExists​(int itemId)
      Confirms if an element with a certain Id exists in the Database.
      Parameters:
      itemId - id of the item to check
      Returns:
      true if exists, otherwise false

    • itemNameExists

      boolean itemNameExists​(java.lang.String itemName)
      Confirms if an item with a certain name exists in the Database.
      Parameters:
      itemName - name of the item to check
      Returns:
      true if exists, otherwise false

    • createItem

      void createItem​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, java.lang.String itemName)
      Adds a new item
      Parameters:
      resp - HttpServletResponse type used to send http response
      itemName - name of the item to create

    • updateItem

      void updateItem​(Warehouse warehouse, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, int itemId, java.lang.String itemDescription)
      Update item's description
      Parameters:
      warehouse - Warehouse object
      resp - HttpServletResponse type used to send http response
      itemId - id of the item
      itemDescription - new description

    • buildItemsList

      void buildItemsList​(boolean bool)
      Populates the Warehouse items list information saved in the database
      Parameters:
      bool - true populates only with items whose stock >0, false populates with all items in the database

    • createDeposit

      void createDeposit​(Warehouse warehouse, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, int itemId, int quantity)
      Creates Deposit object
      Parameters:
      warehouse - Warehouse object
      resp - HttpServletResponse type used to send http response
      itemId - item that will receive the deposit
      quantity - quantity that will be deposited

    • jSonSingleOutputSender

      void jSonSingleOutputSender​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Creates and sends a Json file Used to send error responses (no item, no delivery,...)
      Parameters:
      resp - HttpServletResponse type used to send http response
      key - json key to be sent
      value - json value to be sent
